name: PINK (mlkrn)
description:
PINK is the color of freedom.

PINK an Orwellian comedy in the format of an interactive fiction. 

And because we live in one today, it must be said loud and clear: this is a work of fiction. 

Events and characters featured in-game are entirely fictional, any resemblance to actual events and persons is coincidental. The opinions expressed are those of the characters and should not be confused with the developers’.

made by mlkrn

inspired by @letopisi_rus

made for Mini Jam 111: Colors².
